content: {'id': '24294142-e19b-3111-80cf-a922955671a0', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's Larsen & Toubro jumps as investors cheer earnings beat", 'description': '', 'summary': "The stock, which rose by as much as 4.5% rupees to 3,652.70 rupees, was the top percentage gainer on the benchmark Nifty 50 index, which was trading flat, and also boosted the infrastructure sub-index, which rose 0.6%. content: {'id': 'c2072609-6232-3de4-8430-fb6ae9fb2691', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's equity benchmarks little changed ahead of Fed decision; tariff worries linger", 'description': '', 'summary': "(Reuters) -India's equity benchmarks ended little changed on Wednesday as gains in Larsen & Toubro after upbeat earnings offset investor caution ahead of the U.S. Federal Reserve's policy decision and a looming U.S. tariff deadline.  The Nifty 50 rose 0.14% to 24,855.05 points and the BSE Sensex gained 0.18% to 81,481.86.  Infrastructure major Larsen & Toubro climbed about 5%, and was the biggest percentage gainer on Nifty 50, after its 30% jump in first-quarter profit came above estimates.", 'pubDate': '2025-07-30T02:43:16Z', 'displayTime': '2025-07-30T02:43:16Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/0fc614aeffe52d44d13efda105c23600', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 533, 'caption': 'A man walks past the logo of the National Stock Exchange (NSE) in Mumbai', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/Om6G0d8I6ngj4a9kdqDLYg--~B/aD01MzM7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/0fc614aeffe52d44d13efda105c23600', 'width': 800, 'height': 533, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/9hYDluY88mk88WKlD13Vlg--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/0fc614aeffe52d44d13efda105c23600', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/indian-equity-benchmarks-set-muted-024316199.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/indian-equity-benchmarks-set-muted-024316199.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': '2f14ba31-979e-3de4-a385-aefb71029300', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': 'Indian benchmarks snap 3-day losing run as Reliance, HDFC Bank gain', 'description': '', 'summary': '(Reuters) -Indian benchmarks snapped a three-day losing streak on Tuesday, driven by bargain buying in heavyweight stocks such as Reliance Industries and HDFC Bank, with gains in infrastructure major Larsen & Toubro ahead of its earnings helping.  The benchmarks fell about 2% in the last three sessions due to fading hopes of an India-U.S. interim trade deal, weak earnings and sustained foreign outflows.  Heavyweight financials, which fell 0.5% earlier in the session, closed 0.3% higher.', 'pubDate': '2025-07-29T02:42:11Z', 'displayTime': '2025-07-29T02:42:11Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/621be9d19f05dd06d50da156051e8a24', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 533, 'caption': 'A bird flies near the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) building in Mumbai', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/viEvv4yaKNm55DX.2ieKbw--~B/aD01MzM7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/621be9d19f05dd06d50da156051e8a24', 'width': 800, 'height': 533, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/wSpAc4fBvl4PMpot4G6pAQ--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/621be9d19f05dd06d50da156051e8a24', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/indian-equity-benchmarks-set-muted-024211212.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/indian-equity-benchmarks-set-muted-024211212.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': '3d765169-4200-3dfe-9c7e-1adc858524a6', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's Assam state pauses green hydrogen policy in setback to investors, sources say", 'description': '', 'summary': "(Reuters) -India's northeastern state of Assam has put its flagship green hydrogen policy on hold, government and industry sources said, surprising investors already hit by a cut in incentives for clean energy projects.  The state, the largest in the northeast, has sought to attract major investments in a region that has lagged behind much of the country in renewable energy adoption, offering financial incentives and waivers to bring in electricity.  Energy firms, including NTPC Green, Larsen And Toubro, Singapore-listed Sembcorp, and Abu Dhabi-based Ocior, expressed initial interest in bidding for green hydrogen projects in Assam, four sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.", 'pubDate': '2025-07-11T13:05:50Z', 'displayTime': '2025-07-11T13:05:50Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': None, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-assam-state-pauses-green-130550509.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-assam-state-pauses-green-130550509.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}
